content: Before going to bed, a real programmer puts on the bedside table two glasses: one with water to drink during the night, and another empty, in case he won't be thirsty.
translations: ita:Prima di andare a letto, un vero programmatore mette sul comodino due bicchieriï¹• uno con l'acqua da bere durante la nott
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Ooneykcall (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
